name: A Story About You & Me
description:
"A STORY ABOUT YOU & ME" is a 2D platformer game about this little boy who doesn't remember who he is and what happened to this weird world full of questions.. but there are so few answers..

KEY FEATURES:   

  1. Atmospheric soundtrack;
  2. Mysterious story you have to figure out yourself; 
  3. Interactive environment;
  4. Simple controls

Thank you for checking this page! This is my very first serious game that I'm very pround of. This is my first step, so not everything will be as perfect as you and me expected. But, please, do leave your comments and questions below, I would like to know what everybody thinks!

YOU CAN FOLLOW ME:

  • Twitter
